startPageTitleUpdateAcsp: View and update the authorised agent's details welsh
useThisServiceUpdateAcsp: Use this service to view and update details for welsh
ifDetailsChangeWarningText: If any of the details we hold about the authorised agent change, you must update them within 14 days welsh
youllNeedToTellUsIfAnyChanges: You’ll need to tell us if there are any changes to the: welsh
amlRegistrationDetailsBullet: agent's Anti-Money Laundering (AML) registration details welsh
detailsAboutBusinessBullet: details we hold about the business welsh
updatingYourAmlDetailsHeading: Updating your AML registration details welsh
updateAmlRegistrationDetailsIf: You need to update the AML registration details if the agent has registered with a different AML supervisory body, or the AML membership number changes. welsh
agentMustBeRegisteredWithOneAml: The agent must always be registered with at least one AML supervisory body. welsh
addingDetailsHeading: Adding details for a new registration welsh
ifAgentRegisteredWithNewAml: If the agent has registered with a new AML supervisory body, you’ll need to tell us the: welsh
nameOfAmlBullet: name of the AML supervisory body welsh
amlMembershipNumBullet: AML membership number or ID welsh
updatingExistingDetailsHeading: Updating details for an existing registration welsh
youCannotEditExistingDetails: You cannot edit the details for an existing registration. If there has been a change, for example, the agent has a new membership number or ID from the supervisory body, you will need to add this as a new registration. welsh
youllNeedToDeletePrevDetails: You’ll need to delete the previous details once you’ve added the new ones. welsh
takesAroundFiveMinutes: It takes around 5 minutes to use this service. welsh
